actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide that small natural gas-fired generators will be treated as qualifying small power producers for purposes of section 210 of that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Public Utilities Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide that small natural gas-fired electric generators shall be treated as small power production facilities under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide that small natural gas-fired generators will be treated as qualifying small power producers for purposes of section 210 of that Act.
